upload.title: Upload Your Thumbnail
upload.description: Click to browse or drag and drop your image

confirmModal.uploadDescription: Set this image as your stream thumbnail?
confirmModal.uploadMessage: This thumbnail will be displayed when your stream is offline. All members will see this update immediately.
confirmModal.removeMessage: This will remove your stream thumbnail. The default splash screen will be displayed instead when your stream is offline.

errors.uploadFailed: Failed to upload thumbnail. Please try again.
errors.removeFailed: Failed to remove thumbnail. Please try again.
